commands.name: /register
commands.description: Registers a new account on the server. You must type your password twice.

commands.name: /login
commands.description: Logs you into your account using your previously registered password.

commands.name: /sethome
commands.description: Allows you to set a personal home location.

commands.name: /home
commands.description: Teleports you to a previously set home.

commands.name: /tpa
commands.description: Request to teleport to a player.

commands.name: /tpaccept
commands.description: Accept a teleport request.

commands.name: /shop
commands.example: Use /shop to open the economy shop.
commands.description: Opens the shop where you can buy and sell items.

commands.name: /sellhand
commands.example: Sell the item in your hand using /sellhand.
commands.description: Sells the item you are currently holding.

commands.name: /sellgui
commands.description: Sell multiple items at once.

commands.name: /sit
commands.description: Sit anywhere in the world.

commands.name: /lay
commands.description: Lay down on the ground.

commands.name: /spin
commands.description: Spin in place.

commands.name: /crawl
commands.description: Crawl on the ground.

commands.name: /bellyflop
commands.description: Lay down on the ground on your stomach.

commands.name: /claim
commands.description: Creates a land claim where you are standing using your available claim blocks.

commands.name: /trust
commands.description: Grants a player full building rights inside your claim.

commands.name: /accesstrust
commands.description: Grants a player permission to use doors, buttons, and levers inside your claim.

commands.name: /containertrust
commands.description: Allows a player to open chests and use crafting tables in your claim.

commands.name: /untrust
commands.description: Removes all permissions for the specified player in your claim.

commands.name: /abandonclaim
commands.description: Deletes your current claim, making the land available for others to claim.

commands.name: /abandonallclaims
commands.description: Deletes all of your claims.

commands.name: /claimlist
commands.description: Displays a list of all claims you currently own.

commands.name: /trustlist
commands.description: Shows a list of all players you have trusted in your claim.

commands.name: /subdivideclaims
commands.description: Allows you to create subdivisions within a larger claim for better management.

commands.name: /basicclaims
commands.description: Switches back to basic claim mode after using subdivision mode.

commands.name: /buyclaimblocks
commands.description: Purchases more claim blocks using in-game currency if enabled.

commands.name: /sellclaimblocks
commands.description: Sells your claim blocks for in-game currency if enabled.

commands.name: /trapped
commands.description: If stuck inside a claim, this command teleports you to the nearest safe location.

commands.name: /ITF Toggle Visibility
commands.description: Toggles item frame visibility.

commands.name: /ITF Toggle Glow
commands.description: Toggles item frame Glow.

commands.name: /trade
commands.description: Send a trade request.

commands.name: /trade accept
commands.description: Accept a trade request.

commands.name: /mcstats
commands.description: Shows your mcMMO stats.

commands.name: /mctop
commands.description: Displays top mcMMO players.

commands.name: /party
commands.description: Create or join an mcMMO party.

commands.name: /repair
commands.description: Repairs items if you have enough levels.

commands.name: /inspect
commands.description: Inspect another playerâ€™s mcMMO stats.
